item.title: Mexico Severs Diplomatic Ties With Ecuador After Police Storm Its Embassy To Arrest Politician
item.description: Police broke into the Mexican Embassy to arrest a former Ecuadorian vice president who had sought political asylum.
item.content:encoded: Police broke into the Mexican Embassy to arrest a former Ecuadorian vice president who had sought political asylum.

item.title: South African Soccer Player And Olympian Killed In Carjacking At Age 24
item.description: Luke Fleurs represented South Africa at the Tokyo Olympics.
item.content:encoded: Luke Fleurs represented South Africa at the Tokyo Olympics.

item.title: Israel Dismisses 2 Officers Over Deadly Drone Strikes On Aid Workers In Gaza
item.description: The World Central Kitchen food charity called the probe and disciplinary actions “important steps forward," but said systemic change is needed.
item.content:encoded: The World Central Kitchen food charity called the probe and disciplinary actions “important steps forward," but said systemic change is needed.

item.title: Israeli Minister Uses Air Quotes With 'Innocent People In Gaza' Mention
item.description: The dismissive motion came as Economic Minister Nir Barkat claimed that Israel doesn't "want anybody, any civilian, to suffer."
item.content:encoded: The dismissive motion came as Economic Minister Nir Barkat claimed that Israel doesn't "want anybody, any civilian, to suffer."

item.title: NATO Marks 75th Birthday As Russia's War In Ukraine Gnaws At Its Unity
item.description: “Ukraine is under heavy attacks, like daily, 24-seven,” Estonian Foreign Minister Margus Tsahkna said.
item.content:encoded: “Ukraine is under heavy attacks, like daily, 24-seven,” Estonian Foreign Minister Margus Tsahkna said.

item.title: Rescuers In Taiwan Search For Those Missing After Major Earthquake
item.description: Taiwanese Primer Chen Chien-jen visited some earthquake evacuees in the morning at a temporary shelter.
item.content:encoded: Taiwanese Primer Chen Chien-jen visited some earthquake evacuees in the morning at a temporary shelter.
